scripts.zip: npm run build && rm -f function.zip && zip -j function.zip dist/*.js src/*.json src/*.md package.json package-lock.json
scripts.setup: dotenv -e .env -- bash -c 'yc config set cloud-id $YC_CLOUD_ID && yc config set folder-id $YC_FOLDER_ID'
scripts._deploy-common: npm run clear-cache && npm run zip && yc serverless function version create --function-name=$YC_FUNCTION_NAME --runtime=$YC_RUNTIME --entrypoint=$YC_ENTRYPOINT --memory=$YC_MEMORY --execution-timeout=$YC_EXECUTION_TIMEOUT --source-path=function.zip --cloud-id=$YC_CLOUD_ID --folder-id=$YC_FOLDER_ID --service-account-id=$YC_SERVICE_ACCOUNT --environment BOT_TOKEN=$BOT_TOKEN,YC_FOLDER_ID=$YC_FOLDER_ID,YDB_ENDPOINT=$YDB_ENDPOINT,YDB_DATABASE=$YDB_DATABASE,YDB_CONNECTION_STRING=$YDB_CONNECTION_STRING && echo "Function deployed. Attempting to initialize database..." && yc serverless function invoke --name=$YC_FUNCTION_NAME --data "{\"setup_database\": true}" && echo "Database initialization call finished."
scripts.clear-cache: unset BOT_TOKEN && unset YC_FUNCTION_NAME && unset YDB_DATABASE
